component.name: Aemeath OS
component.summary: A distroless Linux operating system based on Freedesktop SDK, with the KDE Plasma desktop.

description.p: An experimental distroless Linux operating system based on the Freedesktop SDK, running the KDE Plasma desktop environment.

Aemeath is immutable, and does not have a package manager. System updates are image-based, while applications are installed from Flatpak. It aims to include the latest KDE software, while building on top of the same Freedesktop SDK used by the Flatpak runtime.
